name: European Entrepreneur Verlagsgesellschaft U.G.
goal: The European Entrepreneur Verlag publishes magazines and different material related to entrepreneurship in Europe with a special focus on European Union -
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Digital Agenda, Finance Policy, Trade, Start-Ups, Funding Programmes, Copyright, Tourism, Micorbusiness, Start-Ups, Female Entrepreneurship
